name: Virtuous Vanquisher of Evil
description:
Evil is lurking below, and you have been called upon to vanquish it. It's all up to You, Hero!

Hack 'n slash action

Familiar fantasy setting

Oldskool Bosses

Dynamic item drops

Hero appearance depend on items

4 pixels tall hero

Easy to learn, hard to master

Use with gamepad or keyboard

  • There's a save feature that saves your gear between sessions. NOTE: it does not save your inventory.
  • The game can be played in the browser, but it is recommended to download for the ultimate experience (if you have poppy sound or problems with the game-controller, try downloading as a first step.)
  • FAQ and more info at the Virtuous Vanquisher of Evil github wiki.
